mapper.sql: p.id as id, p.kee as kee, p.name as name, p.language as language, p.parent_kee as parentKee
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rules_profiles (kee, parent_kee, name, language) VALUES (#{kee}, #{parentKee}, #{name}, #{language})
mapper.select: SELECT FROM rules_profiles p ORDER BY p.name, p.language
SELECT FROM rules_profiles p WHERE p.language=#{language} ORDER BY p.name
SELECT FROM rules_profiles p WHERE p.parent_kee=#{id} ORDER BY p.name
